dict.string: CLEANUP (Delete) VARIABLES -- In Case Macro Was Cancelled Previously
SCRIPT: DELETE All Variables with KMVarPrefix and in KMVars_To_Delete

tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
--- DELETE ALL KM VARIABLES WITH THIS PREFIX ---
set prefixStr to getvariable "KMVarPrefix"
if (prefixStr ≠ "") then set value of variables whose name starts with prefixStr to "%Delete%" --display notification "All KM Variables with PREFIX = '" & prefixStr & ¬ -- "' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script" end if
--- DELETE KM VARS IN THE VARIABLE "KMVars_To_Delete" ---
set varsToDeleteList to paragraphs of (getvariable "KMVars_To_Delete")
if (varsToDeleteList ≠ {}) then
set varsToDeleteList to varsToDeleteList & {"KMVars_To_Delete"}
repeat with oVar in varsToDeleteList setvariable (oVar as text) to "%Delete%" end repeat
--display notification "All KM Variables in 'KMVars_To_Delete' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script"
end if
end tell
SET Search URL to Your Preferred Search Provider
Set Wiki Pick List if it is Not Defined
SET List of Wiki Search Terms

[[ TOPICS FROM WIKI HOME PAGE ]] About Keyboard Maestro Actions Applications Calculations & Operators Clipboards Collections Conditions Dates and Times Dictionaries External Links Forum Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) Functions Getting Started Glossary Ideas Macro Groups Macro Library (example macros) Macros Quick Start Regular Expressions Scripting Scripting the Keyboard Maestro editor Searching the Wiki Status Menu Syncing Macros Between Macs Text Fields Tips Tokens Transition from other programs or versions Transition From QuicKeys Triggers Troubleshooting User Manual Variables Videos WhatsNew Wishlist
SCRIPT: Get Current Tab Number in FrontMost Browser (AS)

set currentApp to path to frontmost application as text
if (currentApp contains "Safari") then
tell application "Safari" set origTabNum to index of current tab of window 1 end tell
else
tell application "Google Chrome" set origTabNum to active tab index of window 1 end tell
end if
return origTabNum
~~~ PROMPT USER IF NO SELECTION WAS MADE ~~~
IF: Prompt User for Search Term if No Selection Was Made
~~~ NO SELECTION WAS MADE -- PROMPT USER FOR QUERY ~~~

dict.string:
The Keyboard Maestro Wiki site will be searched for this term.
Click "Pick List" (or press ⌘P) to Select from Pick List from Wiki TOC. .
Enter Query Search Term for KM Wiki
IF: Pick List Button Was Selected, Show List
IF: Requested, Add Manual Search Term to Pick List
RegEx: Remove All Text in Brackets, inclusive
~~~ SELECTION WAS MADE -- SET SEARCH TERM TO CLIPBOARD ~~~

dict.string: PAUSE: UNTIL Google Site Search Page Appears
Pause for 0.2 Sec (Safari Requires more time)
SCRIPT: ADD Numbers to Search Results (JSIB)
ENTER Order Number of Link to CLICK
SCRIPT: Get URL Chosen by Number (JSIB)
PAUSE: UNTIL KM Wiki Page Appears
WHILE: Loop Until User Does NOT Click Rescan

dict.string:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ CLICK BUTTON when ready to return to KM Post ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
BUTTON KEY ACTION • MarkDown Link RETURN Paste MD Link into Post • Link URL ⌘U Paste URL only • Link Text ⌘T Paste Text only • Rescan ⌘R Rescan Wiki Page (do not return) • Cancel ESC CANCEL MACRO
(NOTE: Prompt must have focus for Shortcut Keys to work.)
Check "CopyToClipboard" IF you want ONLY to copy the text, chosen by the button you click, to be Clipboard, and do NOT Paste. .
IF: Requested, Add Manual Search Term to Pick List
IF: AddAsFav was checked, Add Prefix
SWITCH: Set TextToPaste Based on Button Pressed
GRP: RETURN TO ORIGINAL TAB CONTAINING POST
GRP: Close New Tabs Just Opened
SCRIPT: Make Original Browser Tab Active (AS)

### Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+ ### set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE" tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" set origTabNum to (getvariable "Local__OrigTabNum" instance kmInst) as number end tell set currentApp to path to frontmost application as text if (currentApp contains "Safari") then tell application "Safari" set current tab of window 1 to (tab origTabNum of window 1) end tell else tell application "Google Chrome" set active tab index of window 1 to origTabNum end tell end if return
PAUSE: Until Original Window Title is FrontMost
IF: PASTE into Post; OR Set CLIPBOARD
Clipboard SET to MD Link to KM Wiki
DELETE CLIPBOARDS Used in this macro
SCRIPT: DELETE All Variables with KMVarPrefix and in KMVars_To_Delete

tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
--- DELETE ALL KM VARIABLES WITH THIS PREFIX ---
set prefixStr to getvariable "KMVarPrefix"
if (prefixStr ≠ "") then set value of variables whose name starts with prefixStr to "%Delete%" --display notification "All KM Variables with PREFIX = '" & prefixStr & ¬ -- "' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script" end if
--- DELETE KM VARS IN THE VARIABLE "KMVars_To_Delete" ---
set varsToDeleteList to paragraphs of (getvariable "KMVars_To_Delete")
if (varsToDeleteList ≠ {}) then
set varsToDeleteList to varsToDeleteList & {"KMVars_To_Delete"}
repeat with oVar in varsToDeleteList setvariable (oVar as text) to "%Delete%" end repeat
--display notification "All KM Variables in 'KMVars_To_Delete' have been deleted." with title "Keyboard Maestro Script"
end if
end tell
22)KM Wiki -- Google Search and Return Markdown Link in Forum Post @KMF
